articles.author: news24
articles.title: Half of EU vaccinated as Covid-19 returns to China's Wuhan - News24
articles.description: Half of the European Union's population has now been fully vaccinated against Covid-19, an AFP tally showed, as China's Wuhan said it would test all 11 million residents after the virus returned to where it first emerged.
articles.content:
• All 11 million people in Wuhan will be tested for coronavirus after a fresh outbreak.
  • Meanwhile half of the European Union's population has been fully vaccinated.
  • Spain leads … [+4121 chars]
